Rulings.Goat:
●If you have 3 7's and destroy them all, you get 2100 LP.
●If your opponent also has 7's, they are also destroyed.
●If you have 3 7's and activate their effect, your opponent can chain Imperial Order to negate the effect.
●Each effect of 7 that gives you 700 LP goes on a chain, so if multiple 7's are sent to the GY simultaneously, each effect is 1 step in the chain.
●If other cards are also sent to the GY at the same time, like Sangan or Black Pendant, the card controlled by the turn player is Step 1.
●If your 3rd 7 is activated, but destroyed by Mystical Space Typhoon in a chain, you can't activate its effect, but you still gain 700 LP for its GY effect.

Rulings.Base:
1. If you have 3 copies of "7" and destroy them all, you get 2100 Life Points.
2. If your opponent also has copies of "7", they are also destroyed.
3. If you have 3 copies of "7" and activate their effect, your opponent can chain "Imperial Order" to negate the effect.
4. Each effect of "7" that gives you 700 Life Points goes on a chain, so if multiple copies of "7" are sent to the GY simultaneously, each effect is 1 step of the chain.
5. If other cards are also sent to the GY at the same time, like "Sangan" or "Black Pendant", the card controlled by the turn player is Step 1.
6. If your 3rd "7" is activated, but destroyed by "Mystical Space Typhoon" in a chain, you can't activate its effect, but you still gain 700 Life Points for its GY effect.
